mapper.update: update sys_issue set`grade_id` = #{gradeId}, `advice_id` = #{adviceId},`user_id` = #{userId}, create_time = now(),`done_content` = #{doneContent} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from sys_advice s where s.grade_id=#{gradeId}
and s.frequency is NULL
and ( ( s.start_time <= now() and s.end_time >= now() and frequency = DAYOFWEEK(now()) ) or s.frequency=0 )
and s.id not in (select advice_id from sys_issue where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND user_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY create_time DESC

select * from sys_advice s where s.grade_id=#{gradeId} and ( s.frequency is NULL or ( s.start_time <= now() and s.end_time >= now() and frequency = DAYOFWEEK(now()) ) ) and s.id not in (select advice_id from sys_issue where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND user_id=#{userId}) ORDER BY create_time DESC

select si.id, sa.title, sa.content, su.username, (case when sb.num is NULL THEN 0 else sb.num END) num, si.done_content doneContent from sys_issue si LEFT JOIN sys_advice sa on sa.id=si.advice_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.user_id=si.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_comment sc on sc.id=si.id LEFT JOIN (select count(type) num,issue_id from sys_comment where type=1 and user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY issue_id) sb on sb.issue_id=si.id where si.grade_id=#{gradeId} and si.advice_id is not NULL GROUP BY si.create_time desc
select su.username, sc.comment_content commentContent from sys_comment sc LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.user_id=sc.user_id where type=2 AND sc.issue_id=#{issueId} GROUP BY sc.comment_content DESC
